Verses: 1 karththaridaththil Thirumbuvom Vaarungal; Nammaip Peerinaar, Avare Nammai Gunamaakkuvaar; Nammai Adiththaar, Avare Nammudaiya Kaayangalaik Kattuvaar.
2 irandunaalukkuppinbu Avar Nammai Uyirppippaar; Moondraam Naalil Nammai Ezhuppuvaar; Appozhudhu Naam Avarudaiya Samugaththil Pizhaiththiruppom.

3 appozhudhu Naam Arivadaindhu, Karththarai Ariyumpadi Thodarndhu Povom; Avarudaiya Purappadudhal Arunodhayampola Aayaththamaayirukkiradhu; Avar Mazhaiyaippolavum, Boomiyinmel Peyyum Munmaari Pinmaariyaippolavum Nammidaththil Varuvaar.
4 eppiraayeeme, Unakku Enna Seyven? Yoodhaave, Unakku Enna Seyven? Ungal Bakthi Kaalaiyil Kaanum Megaththaippolavum, Vidiyarkaalaiyilthondrum Paniyaippolavum Ozhindhupogiradhu.
5 aagaiyaal Theerkkadharisigalaikkondu Avargalai Vettinen; En Vaaimozhigalaikkondu Avargalai Adhampanninen; Unmel Varum Thandanaigal Velichchaththaippol Velippadum.
6 paliyai Alla Irakkaththaiyum, Thaganapaligalaippaarkkilum Dhevanai Arigira Arivaiyum, Virumbugiren.
7 avargalo Aadhaamaippol Udanpadikkaiyai Meeri, Ange Enakkuvirodhamaaith Dhrogampanninaargal.
8 keeleyaadh Akkiramam Seygiravargalin Pattanam; Adhu Raththakkaaladigalaal Midhikkappattirukkiradhu.
9 parigaararin Koottangal Oruvanukkuk Kaaththirukkiradhupola, Seegemukkuppogira Vazhiyile Kolaiseygira Aasaariyarin Koottam Kaaththirukkiradhu; Dhoshamaana Kaariyangalaiye Seygiraargal.
10 bayangaramaana Kaariyaththai Isravel Vamsaththaaril Kanden; Ange Eppiraayeemin Vesiththanam Undu; Isravel Theettuppattuppoyitru.
